questions.question: What is Christs May Ball 2024?
answers: Christs College traditionally holds a May Ball on the Tuesday of May Week following undergraduate examinations.
This year our theme is ‘Paradise Lost’. Experience the incredible world of John Milton’s epic, stretching from the ethereal Fields of Elysium to the

questions.question: What type of identification will I need to enter the ball?
answers: ID cards, driving licences and passports are the only acceptable forms of identification.
A Cambridge University card must bear the guests full name and date of birth (e.g. an undergraduate card).
